EmailTemplate.description: Webcasts recently added to the CPE library
EmailTemplate.name: MULTI ENGAGE | New to the CPE Library
EmailTemplate.subject: Update: Webcasts added CPE Library
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Catch up on what's happening on complianceweek.com with recent On-Demand CPE webcasts.
Latest On-Demand CPE webcasts: Make Your Organization Investigation-Ready: Learn how to get ahead of Dodd-Frank and Other Regulatory Requests 1 CPE Credit | Apr 2
Record Retention Is Back in the Spotlight 1 CPE Credit | Mar 26
How to Tackle Social Accountability Risks in Third-Party Relationships 1 CPE Credit | Mar 19
See the full list: https://www.complianceweek.com/webcasts/on-demand-cpe
Thatâ€™s all for this update-- have a great week.
